testcase.name: User edit the case
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page of FreeCRM...........................passed When User logs in with username and password in FreeCRM.....................passed Then User should login and should be on home page of FreeCRM................passed When User select particular case and click on edit..........................passed Then User should edit case and click on save................................passed And User should able to see edited case.....................................passed
